thread.section_title: Ecommerce Templates Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ecommerce Templates | www.ecommercetemplates.com
thread.title: Harvey Braswell
thread.title_full: Ecommerce Templates reviewed by Harvey Braswell

author: Harvey Braswell
title: Harvey Braswell
text:
We are a mom and pop, and have used the Ecommerce Templates platform for five sites since 2004. Andy and his team have consistently provide a superior product and an incredible support structure for their software.
In addition, there are outstanding add on's available to the platform from really talented 3rd party developers.
We are delighted to be a part of the ECT family of sites, and look forward to working with Andy and his team for years to come.
Tiger Motion, Inc.
